creator: sven@byteblaze.se
text:
If I set up a html-form with only one form-field and click submit, tomcat will 
take 15-20 to handle the request, and when the data finally is passed on the 
next page the form-fields value in the request-object will have the value of 
null.

If I however, add a dummy field with irrelevant data, making the total number 
of form fields be >1, it will work like a charm. Also, if I use method GET it 
will work fine with only one form-field.

A one-field POST form easily works for me in milliseconds.  I'm using Tomcat 
5.0.28 standalone, JDK 1.4.2 on Solaris 8.  If you attach a WAR showing your 
problem, I'll be glad to try and reproduce it.
